content.html:
Your Local Marketing Success Starts Here

Learn. Implement. Automate. Grow. This hub will give you all the educational resources and visibility tools necessary to make your digital growth unstoppable.

Get Started

Local Marketing

Boost the digital footprint of your business

Local marketing is all about increasing your visibility within a specific geography. It requires a distinct digital strategy and a unique suite of tools. Meet the Local Marketing Hub: your ultimate resource for mastering local marketing. Explore expert content to enhance your strategies for local SEO, community, reputation management, and more.

Unlock the secret recipe for mastering local SEO straight from the experts

GBP Optimization

How to generate organic visits for Google Business Profile

Optimize your local presence on Google to drive more traffic and stand out in search results
Joshua SaxonOctober 06, 2024
Local SEO

Location keywords: How to optimize for better local rankings

Using location keywords effectively can transform your local visibility.
Joshua SaxonOctober 04, 2024
Listing Management

How to optimize Google Maps citations for local SEO success

Give your business the best chance of discovery on the #1 map app

Learn how to elevate your Google Maps ranking with proven tactics and insights from experts.
Watch

Website Content and Structure

for Local SEO
Enhance your local search visibility with quick, actionable content tips and turn your website into a customer magnet for your business.
Watch

The Ultimate Google Business Profile Playbook

Get ready to dive into the essentials of GBP optimization. Our experts will provide tips and tools for steering your business, covering updates, posting, verification, and multi-location management.
Watch

Local SEO Strategies

for Multi-Location Businesses
Discover the main challenges and opportunities all companies face with local SEO when managing the digital presence of a multi-location business.
Watch

Boost Local Visibility

and Bring More Customers to Your Door
Follow our step-by-step checklist to fine-tune your local strategy and put your business in front of more people in any region, city, or neighborhood.
Watch

Unlocking Agency Growth

Integrating Local Services with Expertise
Uncover the roadmap to integrating exceptional local services with your agency. From diving into the pulse of the local marketing landscape to providing resources and showcasing Semrush tools to simplify the process.
Watch

Make your biggest local marketing goals attainable with Semrush Local tools

Listing Management 

Automatically distribute consistent business information by choosing from 150+ global directories and ensure compatibility with voice search. Showcase and maintain control over your NAP (name, address, phone number), images, and more, all in one place.

Get started

Review Management 

Monitor online customer reviews across the web and manage them from one place. Receive real-time alerts for negative mentions, directly address Google reviews across all GBP profiles, access AI-generated response suggestions, and monitor competitor review data seamlessly.

Get started

Map Rank Tracker (Heatmap)

Track local rankings displayed in a heatmap around your target area, and ranking changes over time. Get rankings improvement recommendations, too. 

Get started

GBP Optimization

Manage your Google Business Profile (GBP) and get in-depth analytics on its performance in local search. Easily place your business information on Google profile, compose an SEO friendly description, pick the right categories for your services, and quickly upload images for optimal performance with our GBP tool.

Get started
How good is your local listing score? Find out today—for free.

Semrush Local: Fueling success for local businesses

1 / 4

Semrush Listing Management offers huge value, not just in results, but in terms of saving money and time as well.

Preston Powell
Chief Marketing Officer at WebServ

What is Local SEO and how to do it

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Semrush Local and what solutions do you offer?

Semrush Local is a suite of tools dedicated to helping local businesses (and agencies that support local businesses) grow by gaining and retaining loyal customers with less effort. We provide businesses with local marketing tools like Listing and Review management, Heatmap (Rank map tracker), and analytics that they need to attract more clients to their door and scale their business.

What is local SEO?

Local SEO optimizes your online presence to increase local traffic, visibility, and brand awareness. It is a core part of any successful local marketing strategy.

Common local SEO tasks include:
● Optimizing your Google Business Profile
● Finding local keywords
● Creating locally relevant content
● Managing customer reviews
Any business that has a physical location or serves a geographic area can benefit from local SEO.

Local SEO can help your business appear in Google results.

Why are listings important for local businesses?

Local citations boost your business’s visibility online. When local citations are appropriately distributed, your listings will appear when users in your area search for the products and services you provide. Poor local citation building could lead to your business losing online leads to competitors and ranking lower in search engines, which will weaken your local marketing efforts.

Why is map ranking optimization so important for local businesses?

Google Maps ranking should be a top priority for local businesses looking to attract new customers and build their online presence. The map and navigation app was downloaded 25.5 million times by US smartphone users in 2021, significantly more than any other app in the category.

With more people turning to Google Maps to find local businesses and the dramatic rise in voice search use, knowing how to rank higher on Google Maps is an essential skill you need in your local marketing toolbox.

Investing in your Google Maps ranking can reap enormous rewards for local businesses—and the difference between ranking first and fourth is crucial for your online visibility.

Why is effective review management crucial for small businesses?

Online review management is a vital part of protecting your brand’s online reputation. Potential customers rely on reviews to help them decide where to spend their money.

Replying to all reviews, both positive and negative, shows both the reviewer and potential customer that you genuinely care. This practice can also improve your local SEO standing, as it betters the chances of your business landing in the Google Maps 3-pack, which is the top three results beneath the map when a local search is carried out.

By implementing a strategy to quickly and efficiently respond to these reviews can help you save time while safeguarding your online reputation. All of which contributes to a holistic local marketing strategy that leads to fantastic results.
